tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE lead_interactions (
  lead_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  interaction_time TIMESTAMP,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  communication_channel VARCHAR(50),
  communication_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE lead_communications (
    communication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_id UUID,
    communication_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    communication_channel VARCHAR,
    communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE lead_interactions (
  lead_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  interaction_date DATE,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  communication TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE lead_history (
  lead_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  history_date DATE,
  history_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE lead_follow_up (
  follow_up_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  follow_up_date DATE,
  follow_up_status VARCHAR(50),
  follow_up_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lead_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_date DATE,
  interaction_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (lead_id) REFERENCES leads(lead_id)
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  interaction_id INT,
  communication_type VARCHAR(50),
  communication_date DATE,
  communication_channel VARCHAR(50),
  communication_content TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (interaction_id) REFERENCES interactions(interaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE follow_ups (
  follow_up_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  interaction_id INT,
  follow_up_date DATE,
  follow_up_notes TEXT,
  follow_up_status VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (interaction_id) REFERENCES interactions(interaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lead_contacts (
    lead_id INT NOT NULL,
    contact_date DATE NOT NULL,
    contact_method VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_details TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (lead_id, contact_date)
);

CREATE TABLE lead_interviews (
    lead_id INT NOT NULL,
    interview_date DATE NOT NULL,
    interviewer_name VARCHAR(100),
    interview_notes TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (lead_id, interview_date)
);

CREATE TABLE lead_follow_ups (
    interaction_id INT NOT NULL,
    lead_id INT NOT NULL,
    follow_up_date DATE NOT NULL,
    follow_up_notes TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (interaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lead_activities (
    activity_id INT NOT NULL,
    lead_id INT NOT NULL,
    activity_date DATE NOT NULL,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    activity_details TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (activity_id)
);
